Main Page | Modules | Class Hierarchy | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | File List | Data Fields | Examples

surfit Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
surfit::areaArea with a constant value (see surfit_area). See Tcl commands for area
surfit::area_userInterface class for making equations from area
surfit::binmanParent class for all garbages
surfit::bitvecA boolean vector with bit-based storage
surfit::boolvecVector of bool type
surfit::cntr3D contour for interpolation (see surfit_cntr). See Tcl commands for cntr
surfit::cntr_userInterface class for making equations from cntr
surfit::color_scaleClass of color scale for func or trend or wfunc
surfit::completerDescribes the surface behavior between other data(task, wtask, iso etc.). See Tcl commands for completer
surfit::completer_userClass for making equations from completer. Equations can be modified with diagonal matrix via modifier1
surfit::curvClass for curves. See Tcl commands for curv
surfit::dataParent class for all kinds of data, using by surfit
surfit::data_managerServes different datatypes (data) usage
surfit::datafileSupports surfit binary and text file formats
surfit::defareaSets domain of the function (see surfit_defarea). See Tcl commands for defarea
surfit::defarea_userInterface class for making equations from defarea
surfit::draw_objectObject to draw
surfit::dynamicDynamically loadable data class (see surfit_dynamic). See Tcl commands for dynamic
surfit::dynamic_userInterface class for making equations from dynamic
surfit::fill_withSets values of all unsolved cells to "value" (see surfit_fill_with). See Tcl commands for fill_with
surfit::fill_with_userInterface class for making equations from fill_with
surfit::fltTectonical fault line (see surfit_flt). See Tcl commands for flt
surfit::flt_userInterface class for making equations from flt_user
surfit::funcClass for a function, based on the equidistant grid with values set at the centers of the cells (see surfit_func). See Tcl commands for func
surfit::func_userInterface class for making equations from func
surfit::gridClass for equidistant 2d-grid
surfit::grid_linegrid based line This simple class describes line passing between cells. Each line described with two cells (first and second). See Tcl commands for grid_line
surfit::grid_userImplemets "Phases" for multigrid technique
surfit::intvecSurfit vector class for integers
surfit::isoLine with a constant value (isoline) for interpolation (see surfit_iso). See Tcl commands for iso
surfit::iso_userInterface class for making equations from iso
surfit::managerServes file_load, file_save, clear_data and mem_info commands
surfit::matlabSparseMatrixMatrix of this type can be saved to matlab binary format as
surfit::matlabVectorVector of this type can be saved to matlab binary format
surfit::modifier1Enables to modify functional matrix with some diagonal matrix
surfit::operInterface class for sparce matrix
surfit::oper_complexComplex matrix, defined by formula
surfit::oper_pointsMatrix for approximation problem solving subject to scattered data-points
surfit::operD1Matrix to serve completer functional for completer::D1 > 0
surfit::operD1_rectMatrix to serve trend functional for trend::D1 > 0
surfit::operD2Matrix to serve completer functional for completer::D2 > 0
surfit::operD2_rectMatrix to serve trend functional for trend::D2 > 0
surfit::pointsScattered points in 3D
surfit::sub_pointsSubset of points for some cell
surfit::surfit_managerServes file_load, file_save, clear_data and mem_info commands for libsurfit
surfit::taskInterpolation points (see surfit_task). See Tcl commands for task
surfit::task_userInterface class for making equations from task
surfit::trendClass for special function called "trend" (see surfit_trend). See Tcl commands for trend
surfit::trend_userClass for making equations from trend. Equations can be modified with diagonal matrix via modifier1
surfit::userInterface class for making equations from different data
surfit::vecSurfit vector of REAL
surfit::wareaArea with a constant value and informational weight (see surfit_warea). See Tcl commands for warea
surfit::warea_userInterface class for making equations from warea
surfit::wcntr3D contour for approximation (see surfit_wcntr). See Tcl commands for wcntr
surfit::wcntr_userInterface class for making equations from wcntr
surfit::wfuncClass for function with informational weight, based on the equidistant grid with values set at the centers of the cells (see surfit_wfunc). See Tcl commands for wfunc
surfit::wfunc_userInterface class for making equations from wfunc
surfit::wisoLine with a constant value (isoline) and informational weight (see surfit_wiso). See Tcl commands for wiso
surfit::wiso_userInterface class for making equations from wiso
surfit::wtaskApproximation points (see surfit_wtask). See Tcl commands for wtask
surfit::wtask_userInterface class for making equations from wtask


surfit-1.0.0pre
